name: Wordfinder Game
description:
Play 2 very different word games in this one app

In classic mode
Challenge yourself to find as many words as you can in the 9 letter grid
with thousands of puzzles waiting to test your word skills.
In Unlock mode
Find the words to turn off all the letters in the grid.

Features
Almost limitless puzzles with controls for puzzle creation.
Intuitive interface
High level of customization
Fully Voice Over compatible
Designed to be played totally offline.

We welcome all feedback.
@2018
